title: two bedroom two bath
map_address: 229 E. eagle st unit 4 near prescott and putnam
posting_body: Top level 1,100sqft furnished condo in the historic Eagle Hill neighborhood.
September 1 lease, but renter may be able to move in early with 15 day notice.

This two bedroom two full bath offers central air, a private office with custom built in bookshelf, a full kitchen that includes a walk in pantry, custom built island that can roll into the pantry, and a drink fridge.
Along with this, there is large roof deck, with 360 degree views, that has a hard wired gas grill along with patio furniture.
The master bedroom offers a walk in closet with custom built shelving.
The master bathroom has a walk in shower along with a Kohler bidet toilet.
Attached to the back of the bedroom, is a private deck that over looks a fenced in common area for the building (there are two ways to access the back deck).
Second bedroom offers a full closet and hook up for cable tv.
Main bathroom has built in linen shelving along with a large shower and tub.
Amenities include central air, trash, snow removal, dishwasher, microwave, washer/dryer, sports/storage closet, etc.
